title: Valencia with Love
description: TRAGEDY BROUGHT US TOGETHER, BUT SOMETHING STRONGER MADE ME WANT TO STAY.RickThe weeks and months after losing Leo were the hardest I have endured. But my friends and my rock of a PA, Paula, helped drag me back into the world. Paula sent me on a break to Valencia. Will I be forever grateful to her for how it turned out?TommyWow, just Wow, that was my first impression when I met Rick at the Beach. All the money I had meant nothing to me. I needed someone to love. Was Rick the someone? Was I ready to love again? Was Rick everything he appeared to be?
author: B.J. Smyth
